info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 12:49PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
info.description:
...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Carolina...
New River At Gum Branch affecting Onslow County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...New River at Gum Branch.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water threatens homes at the end of Forest Bluff Drive. Minor farmland flooding along the river occurs.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:45 AM EDT Wednesday was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river has likely crested and will begin to fall this afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps.
The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 400 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
